ai-kv2.6:1.3_0: Whatever words are suffering (whoever) speakers, all those who suffer through paths.
ai-kv2.6:1.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.6:2.1_0: Whatever words are suffering (whoever) speakers, all those who suffer through paths.
ai-kv2.6:2.3_0: (Only) foolish ordinary people say this to the foolish person, he makes an end of suffering.
ai-kv2.6:2.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.6:2.7_0: a murderer of a perfected one,
ai-kv2.6:2.9_0: he speaks a schism in the Sangha.
ai-kv2.6:2.10_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.6:2.11_0: The story of the Painful Mindfulness is finished.
